      • setOnTabSelectListener

        public void setOnTabSelectListener(OnTabSelectListener listener)
        Set a listener that gets fired when the selected tab changes. Note: Will be immediately called for the currently selected tab once when set.
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener for monitoring changes in tab selection.

      • setOnTabReselectListener

        public void setOnTabReselectListener(OnTabReselectListener listener)
        Set a listener that gets fired when a currently selected tab is clicked.
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener for handling tab reselections.

      • setDefaultTab

        public void setDefaultTab(int defaultTabId)
        Set the default selected to be the tab with the corresponding tab id. By default, the first tab in the container is the default tab.

      • setDefaultTabPosition

        public void setDefaultTabPosition(int defaultTabPosition)
        Sets the default tab for this BottomBar that is shown until the user changes the selection.
        Parameters:
        defaultTabPosition - the default tab position.

      • selectTabWithId

        public void selectTabWithId(int tabResId)
        Select the tab with the corresponding id.

        Parameters:

      • setTabTitleTypeface

        public void setTabTitleTypeface(java.lang.String fontPath)
        Set a custom typeface for all tab's titles.
        Parameters:
        fontPath - path for your custom font file, such as fonts/MySuperDuperFont.ttf. In that case your font path would look like src/main/assets/fonts/MySuperDuperFont.ttf, but you only need to provide fonts/MySuperDuperFont.ttf, as the asset folder will be auto-filled for you.

      • setTabTitleTypeface

        public void setTabTitleTypeface(android.graphics.Typeface typeface)
        Set a custom typeface for all tab's titles.
